sourcesContent:
Register - step 1

ID: Missing ID. ID must contain 9 numbers. Email: Missing email. Not valid emial address. Password: Missing password. password must be 8 characters long and contain at least one letter and one number. Confirm password: Missing confirmation password. passwords must be identical.
ID already exsits in our database
Email already exsits in our database

Register - step 2

First Name: Missing first name. First Name must start with a capital letter. Last Name: Missing last name. Last Name must start with a capital letter. City: {{c.city}} Must select a city. Street: Missing street.
